MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL17 postcode area of St Asaph, affecting properties in Fron Haul, High Street and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8.57am. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12midday. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9.36am on 23rd Jan 2021.
